mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET READCNT = (SELECT NVL(MAX(READCNT),0)+1 FROM BOARD WHERE BNUM = #{bNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) WHERE BNUM = #{bNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET TITLE = #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENTS = #{contents, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TNUM = #{tNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, CATEGORY = #{category, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODID = #{modId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODDT = SYSDATE WHERE BNUM = #{bNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOARD WHERE BNUM = #{bNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( TITLE, CONTENTS, READCNT, TNUM, CATEGORY, REGID, REGDT, MODID, MODDT ) VALUES ( #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contents, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{readCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{tNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{category, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{modId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT BNUM AS bNum, TITLE, CONTENTS, READCNT AS readCnt, TNUM AS tNum, CATEGORY, REGID AS regId, CASE TO_CHAR(REGDT, 'yyyy.mm.dd') WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy.mm.dd') THEN TO_CHAR(REGDT, 'HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(REGDT, 'yyyy.mm.dd') END as regDt, MODID AS modId, MODDT AS modDt, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS commentCnt FROM COMMENTS WHERE REFNUM = #{bNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as commentCnt FROM BOARD WHERE BNUM = #{bNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
